001package gbw.melange.common.shading.components;
002
003import gbw.melange.common.errors.Error;
004
005public interface IShaderComponent {
006
007    /**
008     * The assigned handle for this shader. -1 if the shader has yet to be assigned and compiled.
009     */
010    int getHandle();
011    boolean isCompiled();
012
013    /**
014     * @return An error containing the shader compilation log on error. Else {@link Error#NONE}
015     */
016    Error compile(); //GoLang moment
017
018    void applyBindings();
019    void unbindAny();
020
021    /**
022     * Get the colloquial name of this shader.
023     */
024    String name();
025
026    /**
027     * Get the raw GLSL code of this shader.
028     */
029    String code();
030}
